*slaps self on head upon realizing what I've been doing wrong*

Within an hour, I should have my scenario converter able to read the 
scenario files and put them in a text file.

Note: I am shooting for a text-based scenario converter.  As soon as I 
complete basic functionality, expect to see my scenario converter in 
the web space.
